meta.title: Keshmed — Reliable Used Medical Equipment from Korea for Clinics and Doctors
meta.description: Keshmed is a store of used medical equipment from Korea. Certified second-hand devices for doctors and clinics. Delivery across Central Asia.
meta.keywords: used medical equipment, Korean medical devices, second-hand medtech, Keshmed, medical supplies Central Asia

greeting.title: Your Trusted Source for Advanced Medical Equipment from South Korea

cuttingEdge.title: Cutting-Edge Technology
cuttingEdge.description: We offer the latest advancements in medical technology from South Korea.

certifiedQuality.title: Certified Quality Standards
certifiedQuality.description: All our products meet rigorous international quality standards.

globalShipping.title: Global Shipping & Support
globalShipping.description: We provide worldwide shipping and comprehensive customer support.

reviews.name: Rustamhon Turaev
reviews.feedback: We ordered equipment through KeshMed, and I was not disappointed. The devices are modern, and the delivery was on time. Thank you for your professionalism!

reviews.name: Nigina Omonova
reviews.feedback: I loved how KeshMed works with customers. The equipment is of high quality, and the support at every stage of the order was excellent. Highly recommend!

reviews.name: Mahmudjon Haydarov
reviews.feedback: KeshMed's equipment is the best we’ve purchased in years. Our whole team is satisfied. Looking forward to working with you further!

reviews.name: Shokhista Yuldasheva
reviews.feedback: I am very happy we chose KeshMed. The equipment met our expectations, delivery was fast, and the consultation was clear. Thank you!

aboutUs.title: About KeshMed
aboutUs.description: KeshMed is your trusted partner in advanced medical equipment from South Korea. We are committed to bringing cutting-edge technology and unparalleled quality to healthcare professionals worldwide.
aboutUs.mission: Our mission is to improve patient care and medical outcomes by providing access to the most innovative and reliable medical devices available in the market.

questions.question: Do you provide installation services for the equipment?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer guidance on installation and setup for our equipment. For customers in Uzbekistan, we can also connect you with local technicians for assistance.

questions.question: How long does delivery take to Uzbekistan?
questions.answer: Delivery typically takes 7-14 days, depending on the region. We ensure timely and secure shipping.

questions.question: Can I request a demo of the equipment?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We can arrange virtual demonstrations for most of our products. Contact us to schedule a session.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept bank transfers, major credit cards, and local payment systems like PayMe or Click for your convenience.

callToAction.title: Ready to Equip Your Practice with the Best?
